JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Project controller to Siemens Gamesa in Brande
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
For the R&D Project Controlling Team, Siemens Gamesa are looking for an experienced Project Controller. As a Project Controller you will take care of the daily business administration tasks in some of our R&D projects.

Your daily work will be around global engineers and controlling colleagues in an exciting, innovative and international development environment.

Your responsibilities

  • Support the technical project manager with any type of reporting and participate/support in regular technical & finance meetings
  • Support reporting to DK public funding bodies for funded R&D projects
  • Support month end closing activities
  • Approval of CapEx investment requests and purchase orders
  • Regular project OpEx & CapEx forecasting

What do you need to qualify for this job?

  • You have an education within Finance
  • Minimum 1-3 years of experience
  • You are good in English and Danish – both written and spoken
  • You can convert targets into actions
  • You have a result-oriented and hands-on approach to your job
  • You have a good and determined personality and a great engagement and enthusiasm
  • You have skills and enthusiasm for working with IT tools as Excel, Power Point and PowerBI
  • You have skills in SAP MM and Accounting module

It is a temporary contract, with start as soon as possible until the 30th of September 2025.

Application

The process and employment are through Flair A/S. If you have the qualifications and motivation for the position, please send a short-motivated application and CV today.

If you have any questions for the job position, please contact Recruitment consultant Amalie Christensen at 3838 1134.
